landingPage.welcomeMessageSuffix: , the exclusive dating app that connects ambitious dreamers with those who appreciate life's finer things.
landingPage.feature1.title: Elegant Aspirations
landingPage.feature1.description: Connect with individuals who embody sophistication and can elevate your lifestyle and dreams.
landingPage.feature2.title: Energetic Pursuits
landingPage.feature2.description: Find partners who match your ambition and bring excitement to your journey of reaching for the moon.
landingPage.feature3.title: Empathetic Connections
landingPage.feature3.description: Discover relationships where mutual understanding and emotional support sweeten every interaction.
landingPage.subFeature1.title: Curated Matches
landingPage.subFeature1.description: Our advanced algorithm ensures you connect with individuals who truly complement your lifestyle and aspirations.
landingPage.subFeature2.title: Exclusive Events
landingPage.subFeature2.description: Participate in high-end, curated events designed to foster meaningful connections in luxurious settings.

errorPage.title: 404 - You're lost in love
errorPage.description: Oops! It seems Cupid's arrow missed this page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.userResponsibilities: You are responsible for your use of the Services, for any Content you post to the Services, and for any consequences thereof. The Content you submit, post, or display will be able to be viewed by other users of the Services and through third party services and websites. You should only provide Content that you are comfortable sharing with others under these Terms.
